analyzed: shin tu brtan no // g-yo ba med do //
translated: He is very stable.🔽He is unmoving.

original: mi sgul to //
analyzed: mi sgul to //
translated: He is unshakable.

original: 'gyur pa med do //
analyzed: 'gyur pa med do //
translated: He is unchanging.

original: rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: He is nonconceptual.

original: shin tu zhi ba'o //🔽bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo //
analyzed: shin tu zhi ba'o // bsnyengs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad dang shin tu bral lo //
translated: He is very peaceful.🔽He is completely free from all fear and anxiety.

original: sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu spangs so //
analyzed: sdug pa dang khong khro ba shin tu spangs so //
translated: He has completely abandoned attachment and aversion.

original: sangs @47a *// rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad do //🔽byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sangs @47a *// rgyas kyi spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad do // byams pa chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is continuously engaged in the conduct of the buddhas.🔽He possesses the power of great love.

original: thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis dbang po shin tu dben pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i gnas kyis dbang po shin tu dben pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the faculty of the abode of great compassion.

original: bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has a mind that is free from anxiety.

original: thugs shin tu brten zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: thugs shin tu brten zhing nyams pa mi mnga' ba'o //
translated: His mind is very stable and does not deteriorate.

original: tshur zil gyis mi gnon la phar zil gyis gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: tshur zil gyis mi gnon la phar zil gyis gnon pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste /
translated: He has a mind that is not overpowered by others and overpowers others.

original: bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad shin tu zil gyis gnon to //
translated: He completely overwhelms all the māras, all the gods belonging to the class of māras, and all the hosts of māras.

original: shin tu spa gong ngo //
analyzed: shin tu spa gong ngo //
translated: They are completely terrified.

original: de ltar zil gyis mnan te spa gong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo //
analyzed: de ltar zil gyis mnan te spa gong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs tshol lo //
translated: Having been thus overwhelmed and terrified, they seek refuge in the Tathāgata.

original: de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrub ste /
analyzed: de dag la'ang bcom ldan 'das de dag cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba mdzad pa nye bar sgrub ste /
translated: And those Blessed Ones establish the taming of the Tathāgata through three great miracles.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: They become irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs /
translated: This is the great power of the great power of the Blessed Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos drug pa'o //
translated: This is the sixth Dharma of the banner of conduct of the Buddha.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pa ni /
translated: Moreover, the Blessed Buddhas have unimpeded speech.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang de dag thams cad du sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyis rnam par dmigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dang de dag thams cad du sems can rnams 'dul ba'i don gyis rnam par dmigs par kun tu khyab par 'byung ste /
translated: It pervades all the world systems in all directions, and it is perceived in all of them for the purpose of guiding sentient beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs @47b pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @47b pa'i gsung de ni ri rnams la thogs pa med do //
translated: That voice of the Tathāgata is not obstructed by mountains.

original: ri rab la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: ri rab la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by Mount Meru.

original: rin po che'i ri la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: rin po che'i ri la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the precious mountains.

original: khor yug dang khor yug chen po la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: khor yug dang khor yug chen po la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the Cakravāḍa and Mahācakravāḍa mountains.

original: lha'i khyim la thogs pa med do //🔽klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: lha'i khyim la thogs pa med do // klu'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the divine palaces.🔽It is not obstructed by the nāga palaces.

original: gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do //🔽dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med do //🔽lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do // dri za'i khyim la thogs pa med do // lha ma yin gyi khyim la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the yakṣa palaces.🔽It is not obstructed by the gandharva palaces.🔽It is not obstructed by the asura palaces.

original: nam mkha' lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do //🔽mi'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi khyim la thogs pa med do // mi'am ci'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the garuḍa palaces.🔽It is not obstructed by the kinnara palaces.

original: lto 'phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the mahoraga palaces.

original: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
analyzed: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i khyim la thogs pa med do //
translated: It is not obstructed by the human and nonhuman palaces.

original: gal te brgya la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste /
analyzed: gal te brgya la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sgra chen po 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gang ste /
translated: If all the great sounds in all the world systems were to fill all the world systems with the sounds of the different worlds,

original: ca co 'dres par gyur kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: ca co 'dres par gyur kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la bsgribs pa med pa yin te /
translated: even if they were to become a confused cacophony, the speech of the Tathāgata would not obscure the auditory domain of those sentient beings who are to be guided.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' zhig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la lhang nge lham me lhan ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyang rlag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'ba' zhig de dag gi rna ba'i rnam par dmigs pa la lhang nge lham me lhan ne ste go bar mdzad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyang rlag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Only the speech of the Tathāgata would be heard clearly, distinctly, and brightly in their auditory domain, and the words and syllables that convey the meaning would not be lost.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs /
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs /
translated: This is the great power of the great strength of the blessed buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos bdun pa'o //
translated: This is the seventh quality, the banner of the conduct of the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs ni chags pa mi mnga' ba ste /
translated: “Moreover, the minds of the blessed buddhas are free from attachment.

original: @48a *// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: @48a *// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par yongs su sbyangs pa'o //
translated: It is purified over inexpressibly inexpressible hundreds of thousands of quintillions of eons.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyan gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyan gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the single ornament of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang ste shin tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa med cing rnam par dang ste shin tu gsal ba'o //
translated: It is without turbidity, clear, and very bright.

original: bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi zhes bya ba mi mnga' ba'o //
translated: It is without the notion of self.

original: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //🔽nang na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'o // nang na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is without the notion of all phenomena.🔽It is without the notion of the inner.

original: phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is without the notion of the outer.

original: ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'o //
translated: It is unborn.

original: dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad kyis dben pa'o //
translated: It is free from all reference points.

original: zhi zhing gnas pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhi zhing gnas pa med pa'o //
translated: It is peace and without location.

original: rtsom pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without undertaking.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: It is without the notion of the various kinds of perceptions.

original: dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa'o //
translated: It is the cessation of all conceptual thoughts about things.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od dang zhing gsal ba'o //
translated: It is naturally radiant and clear.

original: yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure.

original: dmigs pa dang / yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang / yid la bya ba thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o //
translated: It is not mixed up with any object or mental activity.

original: chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is the domain of the absence of afflictions in all phenomena.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral bas dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purity of the limit of reality through being free from desire.

original: chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is the ultimate teaching of the realm of phenomena.

original: chos kyi dbyings kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kun nas mi zad pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the inexhaustible realm of phenomena.

original: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang tshad med pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi tshad dang tshad med pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from the measure and the immeasurable of all kinds of perceptions.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi brjod pa thams cad 'gags pa'o //
translated: It is the cessation of all expressions of the conditioned and the unconditioned.🔽It is the ultimate object that cannot be expressed by the path of words.

original: tshig gi lam gyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul @48b lo; ;mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi lam gyis brjod du med pa'i mthar thug pa'i yul @48b lo; ;mi zad pa dang chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: It is the ultimate of the inexhaustible and unobstructed realm.

original: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: It is preceded by wisdom.

original: stobs bcu'i rgyan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i rgyan du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the ornament of the ten powers.

original: chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purification of all phenomena.

original: thabs mkhas pas byung ba'o //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas byung ba'o //
translated: It is the arising of skillful means.

original: chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa dang mi 'gal ba'o //
translated: the teaching of the various Dharmas, the teaching of the many Dharmas, and the teaching of all Dharmas without contradiction.

original: dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum du tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: It is not different in the three times.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos gzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du chos gzhi med pa thams cad kyi mnga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of the mastery of all Dharmas, which are without basis in the realm of phenomena.

original: chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la mnga' ba'i 'byung gnas dang mdzod du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the source and treasury of the mastery of all Dharmas.

original: chos kyi tshul thams cad la dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul thams cad la dgongs pa khyad par du rmongs pa med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of confusion regarding the special intentions of all the ways of the Dharma.

original: zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi g-yo la; nyams pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa /
analyzed: zhing gi rgyud du gtogs pa thams cad dang / phyogs kyi dra ba dang / rgyud 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad la mi gnas pa brtan zhing mi g-yo la; nyams pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu gzigs pa chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa /
translated: It is the stable and unwavering, undiminishing wisdom that sees all the realms of beings, the entire net of Indra, and the infinite realms of beings without exception. It is the ultimate of all Dharmas.

original: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pas klas pa /
analyzed: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa thugs rnam par grol zhing zag pa mi mnga' ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol bas shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pas klas pa /
translated: He is liberated in mind and free from defilements, with all defilements utterly exhausted. He is liberated through the liberation of wisdom, and is utterly liberated through the limitless limit of reality.

original: chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa; dus gsum thams cad kyi bsgrub pa med par 'byung ba /
analyzed: chags pa med par rnam par spyod pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa; dus gsum thams cad kyi bsgrub pa med par 'byung ba /
translated: He is free from attachment and always in meditative equipoise. He arises without any accomplishment in the three times.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen @49a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par thugs skad cig gis rab tu mkhyen @49a *//
translated: He knows in a single instant the minds and all the activities of all sentient beings in the three times without exception.

original: pa ste; 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: pa ste; 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the eighth of the qualities of the Dharma banner of the conduct of the buddhas, the great power of the blessed buddhas.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mi mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni sku mi mnga' ba ste /
translated: “Moreover, the dharmakāya of the blessed buddhas is not a body.

original: rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul tshad med pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body of all the buddhas, which is the infinite domain of the one nature.

original: mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su grub pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su grub pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that is fully accomplished without end or middle.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis zad par mi nus pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that cannot be exhausted by any world.

original: khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pas gos pa med pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that is unstained by the three realms.

original: brten pa'i skus rnam par dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: brten pa'i skus rnam par dmigs pa'o //
translated: It is the body that is perceived by the body of support.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku'i rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su dran pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku'i rang bzhin yang dag par ston pa'o //
translated: It is the body that reveals the nature of the body through the blessing of higher intention and recollection.

original: bden pa med pa dang / rdzun pa med pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa med pa dang / rdzun pa med pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyi yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: It is the body that is purified in the sameness of truth and falsity.

original: chos kyi sku bzhud pa dang / byon pa med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku bzhud pa dang / byon pa med pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body of the Dharma that has no coming or going.

original: 'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pas 'jig pa med pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that is indestructible because it is unconditioned.

original: mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the body of the Dharma that is the nature of the single characteristic because it is without characteristics.

original: yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: yul na mi gnas pa dang / phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that does not abide in a place or a direction.

original: ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ma lus pa thams cad kyi lus kyi sku'o //
translated: It is the body of all the bodies of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the body of the infinite magical emanations and the superknowledges of the buddhas.

original: lus thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i @49b tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: lus thams cad du yongs su gzhol ba'i sku sna tshogs su rnam par dmigs pa mdzad kyang chos kyi sku'i @49b tshul gyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: It is the body that is the object of the various perceptions of all bodies, yet it is the body of the Dharma realm.

original: ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no //
analyzed: ye shes kun tu snang ba'i snying po can no //
translated: It is the essence of the light of omniscience.

original: sku yongs kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sku yongs kyi mdzod du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the treasury of all bodies.

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa med pa shin tu bstan pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that teaches the undifferentiated Dharma realm.

original: khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas kun tu khyab pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the body that pervades all the infinite realms of the three worlds.

original: mi g-yo mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o //🔽yod pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mi g-yo mi dgongs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa'o // yod pa yang ma yin /
translated: It is the pure body that is unmoving and unattached.🔽It is the body that is not existent and not nonexistent.

original: med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: med pa yang ma yin pa'i tshul dang tshul ma yin par rab tu brjod pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body that teaches the right and wrong ways.

original: sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gyur pa'i sku'o //🔽'gags pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar gyur pa'i sku'o // 'gags pa yang ma yin /
translated: It is a body that tames the various inclinations of sentient beings.

original: ma 'gags pa yang ma yin pas 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: ma 'gags pa yang ma yin pas 'dul ba ston pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that is neither obstructed nor unobstructed, and that manifests in order to tame.

original: yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: yon tan rin po che thams cad yang dag par 'byung bas shin tu 'phags pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that is exalted, since it is the source of all precious qualities.

original: chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that is accomplished as the suchness of the Buddha’s Dharma of all phenomena.

original: rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi zhing bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that is naturally peaceful and that has reached the ultimate, which is unobstructed.

original: thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: thogs pa mi mnga' bas chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that has realized all phenomena, since it is unimpeded.

original: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par dag cing /
translated: It is a body that is purified by the realm of phenomena, which is present in all.

original: 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku'o //
translated: It is a body that is well distinguished in all worlds.

original: phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la /
translated: It is a body that is irreversible and unobstructed.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas ye shes thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pas ye shes thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing yang dag par gzhol bas thugs su chud pa'i sku ste /
translated: The body that is understood through the Buddha’s liberation, following and correctly engaging all pristine awarenesses,

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i @50a *//
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu bo che chen po'i @50a *//
translated: is the great power of the transcendent conquerors, the great power of the great.

original: stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu po'o //
analyzed: stobs sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi chos dgu po'o //
translated: These are the nine qualities of the banner of the Buddha’s conduct.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa ste /
translated: “Moreover, the transcendent conquerors’ pristine awareness, which is equal to and the same as all the thus-gone ones’ pristine awareness,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis byung ba'o //
translated: is the result of all bodhisattva conduct.

original: mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa'i spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the special aspiration of the conduct of accomplishment, and it is purified by bodhisattva conduct.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o //
translated: It is perfected by all bodhisattva conduct.

original: tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without distinction.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis bzung ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyis bzung ba'o //
translated: It is the acceptance of all the bodhisattva deeds of all buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: It is the understanding of all the ways of the ocean of bodhisattva conduct.

original: smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam dang spyod pa chen pos yongs su mi dog pa'o //
translated: It is not being obscured by great aspirations and deeds.

original: spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad mi mnyam pa med pas yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'o //
translated: It is the completion of all conduct without any inequality.

original: spyod pa'i stobs la thub par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i stobs la thub par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba'o //
translated: It is the arising of all conduct through the power of conduct that is difficult to overcome.

original: spyod pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purity of all conduct.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par spyad pas rgyud dma' ba med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa legs par spyad pas rgyud dma' ba med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of a low lineage through the practice of the bodhisattva conduct.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med bar spyod pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshad med bar spyod pa'o //
translated: It is the immeasurable conduct of all buddhas.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o //🔽lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma @50b yin pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul mtha' yas pa'o // lam thams cad kyis rab tu brjod pa ma @50b yin pa'o //
translated: It is the infinite domain of all samādhis.🔽It is not being described by any path.

original: lam gyi yul med pa'o //
analyzed: lam gyi yul med pa'o //
translated: It is not being an object of any path.

original: lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: lam thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: He is engaged in all paths.

original: ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes dam pa'i stobs kyi tshul mkhyen pa'o //
translated: He knows the way of the power of the highest wisdom.

original: bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas chos kyi char 'bebs pa'i 'khor lo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the wheel of the rain of the Dharma, which is without fear.

original: dge ba dris pa dang ma dris pa la rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba dris pa dang ma dris pa la rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa mkhyen pa'o //
translated: He knows how to teach the Dharma in accordance with the questions, whether they are good or not.

original: mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa dang mnyam pas shin tu dag pa'o //
translated: He is very pure, being equal to the unequaled.🔽His body, speech, and mind are pure in their activity, and he has attained the meditation of the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the buddhas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.

original: sku dang / thugs dang; gsung gi yang dag par spyod pa rnams la 'phrin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pas brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang / thugs dang; gsung gi yang dag par spyod pa rnams la 'phrin las gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pas brnyes pa'o //
translated: He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pas brnyes pa'o //
translated: He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.🔽He has attained the activity of the wisdom of the buddhas, which arises from all the buddhas.🔽He has attained the conduct of the tathāgatas.

translated: It is inconceivable to all the mundane minds and thoughts.

analyzed: chos thams cad ma lus par mkhyen cing gzigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o //
translated: It is the complete protection of all beings through the knowledge and vision of all phenomena without exception.

analyzed: dus gsum yangs pa thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par mkhyen pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of all the subtle ways of the vast three times without exception, without end or middle.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don mkhyen pa'i phyir phra ba'i ye shes thugs su chud pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa /

translated: It is the pure knowledge of all the worlds without exception through the realization of subtle wisdom by knowing the supramundane meaning.

original: @51a *// phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad du sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: @51a *// phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las brjod du med pa 'jig rten thams cad du sbyor ba'o //
translated: It is the irreversible knowledge that applies the inconceivable activity of the Buddha to all worlds.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku 'grangs pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyis yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku 'grangs pa thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyis yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that penetrates the inexpressible Dharma without letters, by means of the knowledge that penetrates all the bodies of the Buddha.

original: yi ge sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pas brjod du med pa thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang / yi ge thams cad smos shing brjod pa mkhyen pas brjod du med pa thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge that penetrates the inexpressible by means of the knowledge of the various divisions of letters and the knowledge of the expression and indication of all letters.

original: kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos spyad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o //

original: dam bcas pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / skye mched ji lta bar thugs skad cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad khong du chud par ston pa mkhyen pa'o //

translated: It is the knowledge that demonstrates the penetration of all dharmas in a single instant of wisdom, in accordance with the commitments, the bodies, and the sense spheres of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du brjod pa ma lus pa thams cad thugs skad cig gis mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o //

analyzed: klog pa rin po che'i 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i 'od zer re re'i khongs su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chud par ston pa /
translated: Each of the various light rays radiating from the precious jewel of his tongue reveals the emanations of all the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: zhing thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin kun du nar cing mched pas 'od kyi sprin rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba ri rab kyi snying po can zhes bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: zhing thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi sprin kun du nar cing mched pas 'od kyi sprin rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba ri rab kyi snying po can zhes bya ba mnga'o //
translated: The cloud-like adornments of the essence of enlightenment of all the buddha-fields are completely filled with light, and the cloud of light, the precious light radiating from the essence of Mount Meru, is called “the light of the precious jewel of the tongue.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g-yon pa 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa'i mtshan @66a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g-yon pa 'og ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tha dad pa'i mtshan @66a *//
translated: On the lower left canine tooth of the Tathāgata is the Tathāgata’s mark called “the light of the precious jewel of the tongue.”

original: nyid shin tu ston pas spos dang / rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i me tog sna tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang ba kun tu 'phro ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i sprin yang dag par bstan pas /
analyzed: nyid shin tu ston pas spos dang / rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i me tog sna tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer rnam par snang ba kun tu 'phro ba'i sgron ma dri ma med pa'i sprin yang dag par bstan pas /
translated: He also manifested clouds of all kinds of pleasing incense and jewels, flowers, and lamps that emitted light rays from all the jewels and the wheels of the various ways of the tathāgatas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu gsal bas rnam par snang zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du rab tu gsal bas rnam par snang zhing /
translated: He illuminated all the oceans of world realms with his radiance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gdan seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can dri ma med pa la bzhugs pa'i sprin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gdan seng ge'i khri padmo'i snying po can dri ma med pa la bzhugs pa'i sprin /
translated: He also manifested clouds of the tathāgatas sitting on lion thrones with lotus centers.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi ri rab kyi mar me rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings su rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi ri rab kyi mar me rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: He had clouds called the lamps that illuminate all the various jewels on the Sumeru mountains in the oceans of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g-yon pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od sna tshogs kun nas rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems mche ba g-yon pa gong ma la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che gser gyi 'od sna tshogs kun nas rnam par dag pa /
translated: On the upper left canine tooth of the tathagata was the tathagata mark called pure light of the precious gold of the tathagatas,

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi rin po che'i rgyud kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo dang / rin po che'i me tog shin tu snang ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs yongs su 'khyil ba; chos kyi dbyings su gsung sgrog cing /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi rin po che'i rgyud kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo dang / rin po che'i me tog shin tu snang ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs yongs su 'khyil ba; chos kyi dbyings su gsung sgrog cing /
translated: a wheel of the net of the strands of the precious river of the Jambunadi, with various wheels of precious flowers shining, with various complete spirals, proclaiming the Dharma realm,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pas /
translated: displaying the inconceivable emanations of the buddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par mdzad cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par mdzad cing /
translated: bringing the bodhisattvas to maturity,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin zad mi shas pa kun tu mched par 'gyed pas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin zad mi shas pa kun tu mched par 'gyed pas /
translated: and emanating clouds of all adornments that were inexhaustible and spread throughout the realm of space.

original: chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / rin po che thams @66b cad kyi tshen du snang ba'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbyings las gsung gi sgra 'byin pa /
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang / rin po che thams @66b cad kyi tshen du snang ba'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dbyings las gsung gi sgra 'byin pa /
translated: the buddha speech that proclaims the ocean of Dharma, and the buddha speech that emits the sound of the sky, which is the light of all jewels.

original: chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od /
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma'i 'od /
translated: the light of the lamp of the Dharma,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin du snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin du snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o //
translated: and the cloud of the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems kyi mtshams na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems kyi mtshams na /
translated: On the edge of the tathagata’s teeth

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tshems kyi mtshams thams cad na mtshan gcig par me tog gi mtshan dang / rgya mtsho'i sgo'i mtshan gyi sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dal ba las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tshems kyi mtshams thams cad na mtshan gcig par me tog gi mtshan dang / rgya mtsho'i sgo'i mtshan gyi sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dal ba las /
translated: is the mark of the tathagata called the cloud of the mark of the flower of all the marks on the edge of the teeth, which is the color of all jewels,

original: rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed cing /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'gyed cing /
translated: and emits the ocean of light rays of jewels.

original: bzhad mo 'dzum pas sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing /
analyzed: bzhad mo 'dzum pas sangs rgyas kyi 'od nor bu rin po che'i 'od du 'phro ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing /
translated: The smile of the tathagata emits the light of the buddhas, which is the light of the precious jewel, and it is coiled to the right.

original: chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab par rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho'i khongs su chud pa'i snying po can gyis sangs rgyas kyi tshems kyi mtshams thams cad rgyas par gang bas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab par rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho'i khongs su chud pa'i snying po can gyis sangs rgyas kyi tshems kyi mtshams thams cad rgyas par gang bas /
translated: He has the essence of being completely filled with an ocean of precious light rays that pervade the realm of phenomena.

original: skad cig tu 'od kyis rgyas par kun tu rgyu ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kun tu 'gyed pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: skad cig tu 'od kyis rgyas par kun tu rgyu ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kun tu 'gyed pa'i sprin snang ba zhes bya ba mnga'o //
translated: He has the cloud that radiates the light rays that pervade the realm of phenomena in an instant, called the appearance that radiates an ocean of the maṇḍala of the speech of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgros la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / padmo'i mdog dang / 'od ltar snang ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgros la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / padmo'i mdog dang / 'od ltar snang ba /
translated: The voice of the tathāgatas has the color of gold from the Jambū River, the color of a lotus, and the appearance of light.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mdangs rab tu snang bas dpal phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mdangs rab tu snang bas dpal phun sum tshogs pa /
translated: It is the splendor of perfect glory that illuminates the entire realm of phenomena.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / mdangs kyi kun tu khyab par rnam par snang zhing /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / mdangs kyi kun tu khyab par rnam par snang zhing /
translated: It is the appearance of pervading all with the light rays and radiance of all jewels.

original: gser dang / padmo'i mdog yongs su dag pas kun tu sbyangs pas /
analyzed: gser dang / padmo'i mdog yongs su dag pas kun tu sbyangs pas /
translated: It is completely purified by the color of gold and the color of a lotus.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi mdangs dang / mdog tu snang ba mnga'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi mdangs dang / mdog tu snang ba mnga'o //
translated: He has the luster and color of all jewels.

original: de @67a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i mgur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dung gi mgur /
analyzed: de @67a *// bzhin gshegs pa'i mgur la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dung gi mgur /
translated: The Tathagata has the mark of a Tathagata called “conch-shell throat.”

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od lam me /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od lam me /
translated: It is the light of all Buddhas.

original: lam mer yongs su snang bas /
analyzed: lam mer yongs su snang bas /
translated: It is a light that shines with brilliance.

original: mdog shin tu gsal zhing /
analyzed: mdog shin tu gsal zhing /
translated: It is a color that is very clear.

original: gzhi thams cad rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par snang bar byas pas /
analyzed: gzhi thams cad rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par snang bar byas pas /
translated: It is a base that is made of the king of jewels.

original: phyogs thams cad du rnam par gsal ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du rnam par gsal ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing /
translated: It radiates light that illuminates all directions.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: It is a cloud that illuminates all world systems.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g-yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang / gser gyi kha dog rab tu 'phel bas padma'i mdog rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi dra ba rab tu snang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g-yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang / gser gyi kha dog rab tu 'phel bas padma'i mdog rnam par snang ba dang / rin po che'i 'od kyi dra ba rab tu snang ste /
translated: The Tathagata has the mark of a Tathagata called “right shoulder of the Tathagata.” It is the color of a lotus. It is the color of gold. It is the color of a jewel. It is the color of the light of a jewel.

original: kun tu gsal bar chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad cing /
analyzed: kun tu gsal bar chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad cing /
translated: it illuminates the entire Dharma realm;

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khongs su chud pa'i sprin rab tu snang bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad khongs su chud pa'i sprin rab tu snang bas /
translated: it is a cloud that includes all bodhisattvas;

original: sangs rgyas rab tu mang po thams cad snying por byas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rab tu mang po thams cad snying por byas pa /
translated: it is the essence of the many buddhas;

original: rin po che thams cad kyi gzhi dang ldan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi gzhi dang ldan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: and it is a cloud with a base of all jewels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shin tu 'phags shing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shin tu 'phags shing /
translated: “In the middle of the Tathāgata’s back is a curl of hair called the cloud that is the base of all jewels, which is the Tathāgata’s sign of a great being.

original: yongs su rgyas la /
analyzed: yongs su rgyas la /
translated: It is very high and vast.

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi 'od dang; mdog yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi 'od dang; mdog yongs su dag pa /
translated: It is the color and radiance of the gold of the Jambū River.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo rab tu snang bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lo rab tu snang bas /
translated: It is the wheel of the bodhisattvas.

original: chos kyi dbyings snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po mchog tu kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings snang bar rin po che'i rgyal po mchog tu kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: It illuminates the Dharma realm with the light of the king of jewels.

original: @67b de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g-yon pa la sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i mdzod spu'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gzhi las /
analyzed: @67b de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g-yon pa la sangs rgyas kyi dbu'i mdzod spu'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gzhi las /
translated: On the left shoulder of the Tathagata is the Tathagata's usii, the circle of hair between the eyebrows, called the Cloud of the Light of the Jeweled Topknot,

original: rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba sna tshogs shin tu bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba sna tshogs shin tu bsgrubs pa /
translated: which is made of various nets of light rays,

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / padmo'i mdog ltar gsal zhing bzang ba rab tu bkye bas /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser dang / padmo'i mdog ltar gsal zhing bzang ba rab tu bkye bas /

original: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od ston cing /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od ston cing /
translated: It radiates light that manifests miracles in all the worlds and the realm of phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu rin po che'i sprin gyi 'od rab tu snang ba bkye bas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu rin po che'i sprin gyi 'od rab tu snang ba bkye bas /
translated: It radiates the light of the clouds of jewels of the usii of all the Tathagatas,

analyzed: dpal rab tu 'bar zhing chos kyi dbyings snang bar mdzad pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phrag pa g-yas pa'i lhun la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: On the right shoulder of the Tathagata is the Tathagata's mark,

original: mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba rin po che'i go cha /
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnam par phye ba rin po che'i go cha /
translated: the armor of jewels that distinguishes the characteristics.

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser lta bu /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser lta bu /

original: dpal thams cad kyis rgyas pas /
analyzed: dpal thams cad kyis rgyas pas /
translated: It was filled with all glory.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i 'od rnam par snang ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i 'od rnam par snang ba /

analyzed: rin po che'i me tog spos kyi 'od 'phro bas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rgyan rnam par phye bas brgyan te /

analyzed: kun tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su khyab cing /
translated: It was the cloud of the light of the appearance of the ocean of the assembly of bodhisattvas.

analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i rgyan du gyur par kun tu mched cing snang ba'i dbyings kyi sprin ces bya ba @68a *//

analyzed: mnga'o // sangs rgyas kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u la /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /

analyzed: mtshan nyid rgya mtshos kun tu brgyan pas rab tu 'jam pa'i gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi mdog lta bur snang ba /

translated: It was pure, with a halo of light rays that extended to the extent of various jewels.🔽It was adorned with the full-blown flowers of jewels, and the light rays of the jewels were the ocean of the realm of the name.

translated: It was called the cloud of the ocean of the basis of the splendor of all oceans.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi be'u'i g-yas phyogs 'dab chags na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo snang ba'i gzhi'i rgyan /

analyzed: rin po che'i mig 'phrul gyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa las /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyi lhun dri ma med pas rab tu snang zhing /

analyzed: phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'od rnam par snang ba /

analyzed: rin po che'i 'od kyi gzhi las blangs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po can gyi sprin /

original: sangs rgyas padmos yongs su khyab pa'i mdog gi me tog shin tu rgyas pas padmo'i 'od zer rin po che rab tu snang ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang bar rin po che'i sprin rab tu bstan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
analyzed: sangs rgyas padmos yongs su khyab pa'i mdog gi me tog shin tu rgyas pas padmo'i 'od zer rin po che rab tu snang ba'i sprin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang bar rin po che'i sprin rab tu bstan pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: He also has a cloud called “Revealing Clouds of Jewel Clouds of the Light of the Jewel Lotus Blossoming with the Color of the Completely Pervading Buddha Lotus,” which illuminates all the realms of phenomena.

original: rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'od zer rgya mtsho /
translated: The tathāgatas have a mark on their hands called “ocean of jewel light rays,”

original: chos kyi dbyings su bsod nams kyi snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su bsod nams kyi snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa /
translated: which radiates the light of merit into the realm of phenomena,

original: spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: is adorned with all the light of incense,

original: me tog 'od 'phro ba rin po che ltar snang ba shin tu ston pas rab tu 'phags shing zhing gi dra ba la 'jug pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi gzhi kun tu gsal bar rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: me tog 'od 'phro ba rin po che ltar snang ba shin tu ston pas rab tu 'phags shing zhing gi dra ba la 'jug pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi gzhi kun tu gsal bar rnam par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: and is superior through the light of flowers that shine like jewels, which illuminates the net of realms and the site of the seat of awakening.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: The tathāgatas’ hands have the tathāgatas’ marks.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis rin po che'i mdog tu byas te /🔽kun tu snang bar brgyan pa'i 'od dang / rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad dang / thugs skad cig la zhal mngon par bstan @71a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis rin po che'i mdog tu byas te / kun tu snang bar brgyan pa'i 'od dang / rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad dang / thugs skad cig la zhal mngon par bstan @71a *//
translated: All worlds have the color of jewels.

original: pa; sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis gser gyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ba rnam par dag pa bee d'urya'i sgron ma'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: pa; sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis gser gyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ba rnam par dag pa bee d'urya'i sgron ma'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: The light of the adornment of universal illumination, all the objects of the adornments, and the instant of mind that manifests the face, the cloud of lamps of pure light rays of gold that are emitted by the sameness of the buddhas is called ‘the cloud of lamps of vaiḍūrya.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: The tathāgatas’ hands have the tathāgatas’ marks.

original: mig 'phrul gyi dra ba'i mdog /
analyzed: mig 'phrul gyi dra ba'i mdog /
translated: The color of a net of magical illusions,

original: rdo rje'i me tog kun nas yid du 'ong bas rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje'i me tog kun nas yid du 'ong bas rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with the delightful flowers of a vajra,

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dbyings kyi shin tu spras pa /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dbyings kyi shin tu spras pa /
translated: adorned with the essence of the gold of the Jambū River,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul mkhyen pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul mkhyen pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: the cloud of the light of the lamp that knows the atoms of all world realms is called ‘the light of the lamp.’

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: The Thus-Gone One’s hands bear the marks of a thus-gone one.

original: rin po che'i me tog gi mtshon gyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i me tog gi mtshon gyi 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa /
translated: They are lamps of blazing light rays from the weapons of jeweled flowers that pervade all world systems.

original: rin po che'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pas padmo'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pas padmo'i 'od kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: They are based on a jeweled ground and are known as clouds of lotus light.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i sprin stug po glog gi phreng ba kun nas 'gyur bar rab tu 'dal ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i sprin stug po glog gi phreng ba kun nas 'gyur bar rab tu 'dal ba /
translated: The Thus-Gone One’s hands bear the marks of a thus-gone one. They are thick clouds of jewels with garlands of lightning that are completely relaxed.

original: zhing thams cad du snang zhing padmo'i snying po can gyi gdan la sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa /
analyzed: zhing thams cad du snang zhing padmo'i snying po can gyi gdan la sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa /
translated: They illuminate all realms and are seats with lotus centers upon which all buddhas sit.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gser gyi gzhi la rab tu snang ba'i mig 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas mang po'i phyag gis mtshan gyi rgyud thams cad bstan pas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gser gyi gzhi la rab tu snang ba'i mig 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas mang po'i phyag gis mtshan gyi rgyud thams cad bstan pas /
translated: They are magical eyes that appear on a golden ground throughout the realm of phenomena and reveal the entire lineage of marks with many buddhas’ hands.

original: phyogs kyi klong thams cad du 'khor lo dang / mdzod dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / rin po che kun tu bkram pa dang / @71b bkra shis kyis kun tu brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gsal ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi klong thams cad du 'khor lo dang / mdzod dang / phreng ba dang / bum pa dang / rin po che kun tu bkram pa dang / @71b bkra shis kyis kun tu brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings 'od rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gsal ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: In all the spaces in the directions, he has the buddha hand mudra called cloud of light that illuminates the realm of phenomena, which is pervaded by clouds of buddhas in the ocean of world realms, and which is adorned with wheels, treasuries, garlands, vases, scattered jewels, and auspicious signs.

original: sangs rgyas kyi phyag g-yas pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi phyag g-yas pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan /
translated: On the fingers of the right hand of the Buddha are the marks of the tathāgatas.

original: mtshan nyid rin po che yongs su dag pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid rin po che yongs su dag pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa /
translated: They have the essence of the pure realm of phenomena, which is the pure characteristic of jewels.

original: chu'i zla ba lta bur snang ba'i 'od kyi phung po'i snying po can /
analyzed: chu'i zla ba lta bur snang ba'i 'od kyi phung po'i snying po can /
translated: They are the essence of the mass of light that appears like a moon in water.

original: rin po che'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyid kyis gzhi rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyid kyis gzhi rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: They are the basis of the adornment of the characteristic of the king of jewels.

original: rin po che'i me tog gi 'dab ma'i mdog dang tshon du snang bas /
analyzed: rin po che'i me tog gi 'dab ma'i mdog dang tshon du snang bas /
translated: They have the color and hue of the petals of a jewel flower.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi sgra mkhyen pa dang / zhing yongs su ston pas bskal pa dang / zhing gi klong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi sgra mkhyen pa dang / zhing yongs su ston pas bskal pa dang / zhing gi klong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: the knowledge of the sounds of all jewels, and the clouds of the ocean of the realms of the past, present, and future.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g-yon pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par bkye ba'i rin po che'i mdzod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g-yon pa'i phyag sor la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par bkye ba'i rin po che'i mdzod /
translated: The left hand of the tathagata has the tathagata treasury of jewels that is opened by all tathagatas.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi klong thams cad du snang ba rin po che'i rgyal po mang po'i sprin mched de byung bas /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi klong thams cad du snang ba rin po che'i rgyal po mang po'i sprin mched de byung bas /
translated: It is the appearance in the realm of the dharmadhatu of the clouds of many kings of jewels.

original: phyag sor gyi mtshan gyi gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pas /
analyzed: phyag sor gyi mtshan gyi gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od zer rnam pa tha dad pas /
translated: The basis of the signs of the fingers is the different rays of light of various jewels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel ba la /
translated: The fingers of the tathagata are connected by a web.

original: aindra n'i la dang / rdo rje shin tu brtan pa'i rin po che'i sprin gyi tshon sna tshogs rin po che 'od 'phro bar rnam par snang zhing chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pas rnam par snang bar byang chub rgya mtsho thams cad khongs su chud cing /
analyzed: aindra n'i la dang / rdo rje shin tu brtan pa'i rin po che'i sprin gyi tshon sna tshogs rin po che 'od 'phro bar rnam par snang zhing chos kyi dbyings rnam par sangs rgyas pas rnam par snang bar byang chub rgya mtsho thams cad khongs su chud cing /
translated: the clouds of the precious jewel of the vajra of great stability, the various colors of the precious jewel of sapphire, the light of the precious jewel that radiates light, and the light of the precious jewel that illuminates the realm of phenomena.

original: kun tu mched pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i byang chub @72a *//
analyzed: kun tu mched pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i byang chub @72a *//
translated: The light of the bodhisattva, which is an ornament that pervades and spreads throughout the ocean of enlightenment,

original: sems dpa'i 'od kyis /
analyzed: sems dpa'i 'od kyis /
translated: the light of the bodhisattva,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sgra phyag gi mthil nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sgra phyag gi mthil nas /
translated: the sound of the ocean of the conduct of Samantabhadra that comes from the palms of the hands,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du go bar mdzad pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du go bar mdzad pas /
translated: which is understood in all buddha realms,🔽the light of the bodhisattva,🔽which is seen by all bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu snang zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' la rab tu snang zhing /
translated: and the light of the bodhisattva,🔽which is seen by all sentient beings.

original: sems yang dag par bskul ba dang / smon lam gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'od rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzhi nyi ma la sbyin pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phel bas /
analyzed: sems yang dag par bskul ba dang / smon lam gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'od rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzhi nyi ma la sbyin pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phel bas /
translated: the light of the various aspirations and the light of the various bases of the king of jewels, which spread throughout the entire mandala of the thousand spokes of the wheel of various gifts,

original: rnam par snang bar byas shing sprul pa chos kyi dbyings su snang ba /
analyzed: rnam par snang bar byas shing sprul pa chos kyi dbyings su snang ba /
translated: illuminating the emanations that appear in the realm of phenomena.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: He had the cloud of all jewels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa la /
translated: In the secret place of the Tathāgata, which was concealed,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rim pa g-yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'od rab tu gsal ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rim pa g-yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'od rab tu gsal ba dang ldan pa /
translated: there was the Tathāgata’s sign, which was coiled clockwise and had a very bright light.

original: rin po che'i me tog chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i 'od nam mkha' lta bu rin po che thams cad kyi 'od du snang ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i me tog chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i 'od nam mkha' lta bu rin po che thams cad kyi 'od du snang ba /
translated: There was the light of the jewel flower that appeared in the realm of phenomena, which was like the sky and the light of all jewels.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhi thams cad la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhi thams cad la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: It was the basis of the Tathāgata’s wheel, which was present everywhere.

original: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan du rin po che'i 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab cing rab tu snang ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan du rin po che'i 'od sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab cing rab tu snang ba /
translated: In the ocean of the realm of phenomena, in other places, there are various clouds of tathagatas with various precious lights that pervade everywhere and shine.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kun tu snang ba'i klong sna tshogs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kun tu snang ba'i klong sna tshogs kyi sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: The tathagata has a cloud of buddhas that pervades the realm of phenomena, which is called the “cloud of various realms that shine with the characteristic of the realm of phenomena.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g-yas pa la sems can thams cad kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing /🔽rin @72b po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam par snang bas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g-yas pa la sems can thams cad kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing / rin @72b po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rgya mtsho 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam par snang bas /
translated: On the right shoulder of the tathagata’s body, there is an ocean of the adornments of all beings’ jewels.🔽The mass of light from the ground of inconceivable jewels shines and pervades the realm of phenomena in all directions.

original: phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kun nas khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / mtshan gcig pa rgya mtsho'i sprin las /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kun nas khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / mtshan gcig pa rgya mtsho'i sprin las /
translated: From the cloud of the ocean of the same name of the realm of phenomena and the realm of space,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan khongs su chud pa'i gzhi'i mtshan nyid kyis rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma dang / phreng ba kun tu khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan khongs su chud pa'i gzhi'i mtshan nyid kyis rin po che thams cad kyi sgron ma dang / phreng ba kun tu khyab pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: He has the mark of the basis that includes the reflection that teaches the single characteristic of all the manifestations of the Buddha, the lamp of all jewels, and the cloud that pervades all garlands.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g-yon pa la rin po che'i padmo rnam par dag pa padmo'i mdog dang / kha dog gi 'od zer rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sta zur g-yon pa la rin po che'i padmo rnam par dag pa padmo'i mdog dang / kha dog gi 'od zer rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: On the left shoulder of the Tathāgata is the pure jewel lotus, the color of a lotus, and the light rays of color are adorned with jewels.

original: phyogs bcu thams cad du rab tu mched pa'i 'khor lo /
analyzed: phyogs bcu thams cad du rab tu mched pa'i 'khor lo /
translated: It is a wheel that spreads throughout the ten directions.

original: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi la kun nas bzhugs pa'i mtshan gyi sprin yang dag par bstan pa phyogs su mched cing rab tu byung ba'i 'od zer gyi dra bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun nas khyab par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i gzhi la kun nas bzhugs pa'i mtshan gyi sprin yang dag par bstan pa phyogs su mched cing rab tu byung ba'i 'od zer gyi dra bas chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun nas khyab par snang ba'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: “He has a cloud of names that is present in the foundation that is present in all the oceans of the realm of phenomena. It is a cloud that is present in the light of the web of light rays that spread out and appear in all directions. It is called the cloud that appears to pervade all the oceans of the realm of phenomena and the realm of space.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs brla g-yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang / chos kyi 'od kyi spos rin po che rab tu bkye bas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs brla g-yas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che thams cad kyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang / chos kyi 'od kyi spos rin po che rab tu bkye bas /
translated: “On the right thigh of the Tathāgata is the Tathāgata’s mark called cloud of the beautiful ocean of the various characteristics of all jewels and the precious incense of the light of the Dharma.

original: rim gyis mtho bar gnas shing ran pas rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho sprin mdzes pa /
analyzed: rim gyis mtho bar gnas shing ran pas rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad rnam par gnon pa'i mtshan rgya mtsho sprin mdzes pa /
translated: It is gradually elevated and is the right height. It is the mark called the cloud that displays the king of all jewels.

original: thugs kyi skad cig re re @73a *//
analyzed: thugs kyi skad cig re re @73a *//
translated: In each instant of mind

original: la mnyam par kun tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: la mnyam par kun tu ston pa'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: it is a cloud that displays the ocean of the realm of phenomena.🔽“

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs brla g-yon pa la rin po che rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i gzhi'i chos rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pas rab tu brgyan cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs brla g-yon pa la rin po che rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i gzhi'i chos rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pas rab tu brgyan cing /
translated: On the Buddha’s left thigh was the adornment of the basis of the ocean of jewels, which was gradually inclined toward the Dharma,

original: zhabs kyi gshegs stabs rnam par bkod kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung zhing /
analyzed: zhabs kyi gshegs stabs rnam par bkod kyang 'od zer rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung zhing /
translated: and the array of the Buddha’s steps, from which arose an ocean of light rays

original: sems can thams cad la rab tu snang bas /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la rab tu snang bas /
translated: that illuminated all beings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa rgya mtsho skye ba'i 'od zer tshad med pa rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa rgya mtsho skye ba'i 'od zer tshad med pa rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba mnga'o //
translated: and the cloud of the infinite light rays that arose from the ocean of faith in the Dharma of the Buddha, called “the ocean of light rays that arise from the ocean of faith in the Dharma of the Buddha.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs byin pa g-yas pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od zer gyi me tog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu snang
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs byin pa g-yas pa ri dvags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rin po che'i 'od zer gyi me tog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu snang
translated: On the right calf of the Tathāgata was the Tathāgata’s mark called “the flower of the light rays of jewels that shine like the gold of the Jambu River,” which illuminated all world realms,

original: zhing gshegs stabs thams cad la /
analyzed: zhing gshegs stabs thams cad la /
translated: and the array of the Buddha’s steps,

original: 'od zer zhing thams cad yongs su skyod pa /
